version_description:
- Fixed bug that could cause a crash during saving
- Miscellaneous bug and performance fixes

--- What's new from v1.3 ---

- Brand new painting engine with a range of brushes
- Trials extended to 60 minutes
- Color palettes remember where you left off
- Help dialog on the drawing view
- Fixed bug where screen could go partly black after rotating
- Fixed iPhone 4s drawing performance
- Miscellaneous bug and performance fixes

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please contact us: support@colorscape.co

If you like Colorscape, please rate us, it really helps!

- Fixed a bug that could cause crashes when opening the color palettes
- Fixed a bug that could cause crashes when turning a new image into a sketch

--- What's new if you're upgrading from v1.2 ---

- Brand new painting engine with a range of brushes
- Trials extended to 60 minutes
- Color palettes remember where you left off
- Help dialog on the drawing view
- Fixed bug where screen could go partly black after rotating
- Fixed iPhone 4s drawing performance
- Fixed bug that could cause a crash during saving
- Miscellaneous bug and performance fixes

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please contact us: support@colorscape.co

If you like Colorscape, please rate us, it really helps!

- Fixed a layout bug affecting iPhones on iOS 9.3
- Miscellaneous bug and performance fixes

--- What's new if you're upgrading from v1.2 ---

- Brand new painting engine with a range of brushes
- Trials extended to 60 minutes
- Color palettes remember where you left off
- Help dialog on the drawing view
- Fixed bug where screen could go partly black after rotating
- Fixed iPhone 4s drawing performance
- Fixed bug that could cause a crash during saving
- Miscellaneous bug and performance fixes

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please contact us: support@colorscape.co

If you like Colorscape, please rate us, it really helps!

- New paint bucket tool (this is still in beta while we keep improving it)
- Library of images so you can start coloring straight away
- Redesigned home screen
- Performance & UI fixes

- Updated the overall look of the app
- Made it easier for you to get in touch with us
- Added additional content to the library
- Fixed a bug with the paint bucket tool that could cause crashes
- Fixed bug with paint bucket tool that caused crashes when dragging out of drawing area

- Additional images in the library
- Option to include the original image when sharing your drawing
- Better support for processing images that include transparency

----------------------------------------------------------

What would you like to see in future versions?
Let us know by using the "Feedback" button in-app or contacting us at support@colorscape.co

- Fixed bug that occasionally caused crashes while drawing
- Made improvements to paint bucket tool
- Miscellaneous performance and bug fixes
----------------------------------------------------------

What would you like to see in future versions?
Let us know by using the "Feedback" button in-app or contacting us at support@colorscape.co

- Home screen adapts better to different screen sizes
- Ability to share just the outline
- Made it easier to print via AirPrint from the Share screen
- Removed some lag when drawing
- Miscellaneous bug fixes
- Made it easier to share to other apps like Dropbox & WhatsApp
- Minor bug and performance fixes
- Fixed bug that can cause crashes when feedback view disappears

- Color picker now shows the color in hex format
- It's easier to remove the watermark from the sharing screen
- Miscellaneous bug fixes
- Standard palette now includes a broader range of colors

- More tools to help edit and customize your outlines
- Miscellaneous bug and performance fixes

- Fixed crash that can occasionally happen when switching between edit and color modes
- Fixed bug where reset outline edits were not persisted when switching to color mode
- Improved memory performance

- Fixed bug that prevented the deletion of drawings
- Minor stability fixes

-Higher resolution output of images
-Miscelleanous bug fixes
- More options for customizing the look of outlines

- Improved editing and coloring UI
- Improved iPhone X support
- Minor fixes
- Stability improvements
- Stability improvements
- Stability improvements
- Stability improvements
- Performance improvements
- Stability improvements
- Stability improvements
- Stability improvements
- Added more sharing styles

- Community features
- Stability updates

- Community features
- Stability updates

- Improved outlines
- Miscellaneous fixes
- Bug fixes
